bibl.title: Pindar's Paeans: A Reading of the Fragments with a Survey of the Genre.
bibl.note: Part I: Introduction: 1. The Παιάν: A Survey of the Genre; - 2. Pindar's Paeans. - Part II: The Fragments of Pindar's Paeans [Text, Translation, Commentary]; - Note on the Text; - Fragments of Π4 (Groups A-E) [P. Oxy. V, 841 (= Pack2 1361)]; - Fragments Not of Π4 (Groups F-H). - Supplements. - Metrical Appendix. - Repertory of Παιᾶνες by Poets Other than Pindar. - Concordance. Bibliography. Indices.
bibl.seg: RUTHERFORD Ian, Pindar's Paeans: A Reading of the Fragments with a Survey of the Genre.
Oxford, University Press, 2001, 8°, xiv-546 pp. ISBN 0-19-814381-8. £65.
